infractions.description: Initiating a start before the signal
Did not touch the wall at the turn or finish
Head did not break the surface of the water at or before the 15m mark following the start or turn
Completely submerged during stroke
Left position on the back except when executing a turn
Head did not break the surface of the water at or before the 15m mark following the start or turn
Completely submerged during stroke except within 5m whilst reaching for the finish
Did not start executing the turn immediately after turning onto the breast
Turn not initiated at completion of the arm pull after leaving position on the back
Did not touch the wall during the turn
Not on the back upon leaving the wall after the turn
Did not finish the race while on the back
More than one downward butterfly kick prior to first breaststroke kick after the start or turn
Head did not break the surface before the hands turned inward at the widest part of the second stroke after the start or turn
Body not on the breast during stroke
Stroke cycle not 1 arm stroke to 1 leg kick in that order
Arm movements not simultaneous
Hands not pushed forward together from the breast
Elbows not under the water during stroke
Hands brought back beyond the hip line during stroke
Head did not break the surface during each stroke cycle
Leg movements not simultaneous
Feet not turned out during propulsive part of the kick
Executed a downward butterfly kick during stroke, prior to turn, or immediately prior to the finish
Did not touch at the turn or finish with both hands; separated; simultaneously
Body not on the breast during stroke
Arms not brought forward simultaneously over the water
Arms not brought backward simultaneously under the water
Alternating movement of legs or feet
Leg movements not simultaneous
Breaststroke kicking movement
Did not touch at the turn or finish with both hands; separated; simultaneously
More than one arm pull under water following the start or turn
Head did not break the surface of the water at or before the 15m mark following the start or turn
Completely submerged during the stroke
Backstroke, breaststroke or butterfly swum in the freestyle section
Incorrect individual medley stroke order
In the freestyle section, did not return to the breast before any kick or stroke
Incorrect medley relay stroke order
Finish of section not in accordance with rule of the stroke concerned (complete with stroke infraction above)
Did not complete the whole distance
Did not remain in the same lane in which they started
When turning did not make contact with the end of the pool
Took a stride or step from the bottom of the pool
Stood on the bottom of the pool (except in freestyle)
Pulled on the lane rope
Obstructing another swimmer
Use of non-approved device, swimsuit, adhesive substance or body tape
Entered the water during a race not entered in
Relay exchange did not commence from the starting platform
Feet lost touch with the starting platform before the preceding team-mate touched the wall
Relay team member re-entered the water before all teams finished the race
Relay team did not swim in the order listed
Failed to leave the pool as soon as possible at the end of the race or section in a relay
Device or plan used for pace-making
